quagga.input.subject: Re: Projected Vacation Schedule
quagga.input.body:
Have I responded to you regarding this?


   
	Enron North America Corp.
	
	From:  Nicole Mendez                           09/26/2000 02:07 PM
	

To: Dana Davis/HOU/ECT@ECT
cc:  
Subject: Projected Vacation Schedule

Dana,

Can you send me a copy of your requested days so that I can update the 
vacation calendar?  Thanks.

Nicole
